PROPHECY- The Punishment Of My Lukewarm Christians Forever And Ever!
PROPHECY- The Punishment Of My Lukewarm Christians Forever And Ever!
"My people refuse to obey, My son. They prefer doing their own thing, not My will. For that they shall be punished eternally. They had many chances to obey Me, My son, but they refused, preferring their will in the world, My son. I Am angered at My lukewarm Christians, playing the harlot in the world, serving two masters. They never will obey Me, to evangelize the world, and for that I Am incensed! They shall never enter My Kingdom, lukewarm Christians of self and sinful pleasures. They will not obey Me, and for that I shall punish them in Hell, even the Lake of Fire forever! They shall never enter My Kingdom, lukewarm as they are, for I have spit them out of My Body to roast eternally in fire. Lukewarm Christians are everywhere, and they shall never enter My Kingdom! Your LORD has spoken. Amen and amen forever!"
Jesus Is Victorious

SaintVron
GOD makes nobody or forces none of His children to love Him. You will love God just by meeting Him, unless you were very, very, evil.
Quoting:
Anonymous Coward 85666567
Being "coerced" to love him or BURN isnt free will.
Its SATANIC BLACKMAIL.
BUT...if i really wanted to immitate God...
Id find a random woman...and tell her to love me...or i will skin her alive and roll her in salt.
Now...do yoy REALLY think that women would EVERY ACTUALLY LOVE ME...NO MATTER HOW MUCH SHE PRETENDED TO IN ORDER TO AVOID THE ALTERNATIVE?
ITS THE VERY SAME THING WITH CHRISTIANS.
IN THEIR HEARTS THEY ABSOLUTLEY DESPISE GOD FOR THE "CHOICE" THEY ARE GIVEN.
LOVE HIM OR BE TORTURED FOREVER...
WHY DO YOU THINK CHRISTIANS ARE SOOOOO FULL OF HATE AND ANGER AND SPITE?
BECAUSE ITS BUBBLING AWAY THERE JUST UNDER THE SURFACE...
THE NEVER ENDING FEAR AND PRESSURE..
THEY ALL HATE GOD..
THEIR ENTIRE LIVES ARE A TOTAL LIE.
BUT THIS IS WHAT THEY TEACH AND PREACH.
GOD DESIGNED..PLANNED...AND RUNS AND SUSTAINS HELL.
HELL WAS BUILT..SO YOU TEACH...FOR THE SOLE PURPOSE OF ETERNAL TORTURE.
AND GOD KNEW LONG BEFORE ANYONE EVEN EXISTED THAT MOST OF THOSE BEINGS..US...WOULD SPEND ETERNITY SCREAMING THERE.
IN HIS GREAT AND LOVING MERCY..
BROUGHT THEM ALL INTO BEING...AGAINST THEIR WILL...SPECIFICALLY TO TORTURE THEM FOREVER.
HIS MERCY ENDURES FOREVER IS WRONG.
ITS HIS SADISM AND ETERNAL HATE AND SPITE AND SHEER UMITIGATED PRE PLANNED CRUELTY THAT ACTUALLY ENDURES FOREVER...
FOR OVER 90% OF MANKIND...YOU KNOW..THEM CREATURES HE MADE JUST TO TORMENT FOREVER..
WITH THE EXCEPTION OF A SMATTERING OF SMUG ARROGANT HOLIER THAN THOU SNIDE SNARKY FUCKING ASSHOLES..
WE KNOW AS CHRISTIANS.

Quoting: Anonymous Coward
==================================================================
The proper way to look at it is:
Imagine you are on a raft in a river careening toward a waterfall.
God has his hand out to grab you to safety.
YOU must reach back and grab hold.
Is it God's fault you are too stupid or proud to grab his hand?
Quoting: Anonymous coward
============================
No but its GODS fault you are even ON the raft..
its GODS fault the river even exists..
and its GOD who created the fucking WATERFALL..
So FUCK God and his sadistic "hunger games" style BULLSHIT!
He is an evil dictator and a total and utter CUNT!
WE did not ask to be born into this world..
HE FORCED us..
WE did not ask to have to play this stupid fucking game of "LOVE me or I TORTURE YOU FOREVER"....
so take your waterfall making river creating hate inducing torturing CUNT of a tyrant..
AND his so called outstretched hand..and SHOVE it up his ALMIGHTY DICTATORAL SADISTIC FUCKING ASS!

And then there are their ENDLESS FUCKING LIES TOLD IN GODS NAME
THE WORST SIN IS BEING A FALSE PROPHET AND BRINGING RIDICULE TO GOD BY DOING SO.
God does not lie, nor does He fail.
All these are false prophets.
Deuteronomy 18:22
When a prophet speaketh in the name of the LORD, if the thing follow not, nor come to pass, that is the thing which the LORD hath not spoken, but the prophet hath spoken it presumptuously: thou shalt not be afraid of him.
